sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import CalendarModal from './CalendarModal'; const CommunicationHub = ({ onBack, onEmails, onTemplates, onBulkEmail, onComposeEmail, clients }) => { const [showCalendar, setShowCalendar] = useState(false); const communicationStats = { totalEmails: 45, unreadEmails: 12, sentThisWeek: 23, responseRate: '78%' }; const quickActions = [ { id: 'compose', title: 'Compose Email', description: 'Create and send a new email to clients', icon: 'fas fa-edit', color: '#d4af37', action: onComposeEmail, stats: 'Quick Draft' }, { id: 'emails', title: 'Email Management', description: 'Manage client emails, inbox, and sent items', icon: 'fas fa-envelope', color: '#1a472a', action: onEmails, stats: `${communicationStats.totalEmails} Total Emails` }, { id: 'templates', title: 'Email Templates', description: 'Create and manage email templates for quick communication', icon: 'fas fa-layer-group', color: '#d4af37', action: onTemplates, stats: '12 Templates Available' }, { id: 'bulk-email', title: 'Bulk Email', description: 'Send emails to multiple clients at once', icon: 'fas fa-mail-bulk', color: '#2d5a3a', action: onBulkEmail, stats: `${clients.length} Clients Available` } ]; const recentActivities = [ { id: 1, type: 'email', client: 'GreenTech Initiative', action: 'Email Sent', time: '2 hours ago', status: 'sent' }, { id: 2, type: 'template', client: 'All Clients', action: 'Template Created', time: '1 day ago', status: 'completed' }, { id: 3, type: 'bulk', client: '5 Clients', action: 'Bulk Email Scheduled', time: '2 days ago', status: 'scheduled' } ]; const upcomingCommunications = [ { id: 1, date: new Date(2024, 10, 15), title: "Follow-up: Sarah Chen", description: "Grant proposal discussion and next steps", type: "Email Reminder", time: "10:00 AM", actions: ["Reschedule", "Send Now"] }, { id: 2, date: new Date(2024, 10, 16), title: "Bulk Update: All Active Clients", description: "Quarterly grant opportunities newsletter", type: "Bulk Email", clientCount: 12, time: "9:00 AM", actions: ["Edit Template", "Preview"] } ]; const calendarEvents = upcomingCommunications.map(comm => ({ date: comm.date, time: comm.time, title: comm.title })); return (
{/* Updated Header with new CSS classes */}

Communication Hub

Centralized platform for all client communication management

{/* Toolbar with Compose Email button */}
{/* Communication Metrics */}
{communicationStats.totalEmails}
Total Emails
{communicationStats.unreadEmails}
Unread Emails
{communicationStats.sentThisWeek}
Sent This Week
{communicationStats.responseRate}
Response Rate
{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Left Column - Upcoming Communications & Recent Activity */}
{/* Quick Actions Grid */}

Quick Actions

{quickActions.map(action => (

{action.title}

{action.description}

{action.stats}
))}
{/* Upcoming Communications */}

Upcoming Communications

{upcomingCommunications.map(comm => (
{comm.date.getDate()}
{comm.date.toLocaleString('default', { month: 'short' }).toUpperCase()}
{comm.title}
{comm.description}
{comm.type}
{comm.time}
{comm.clientCount && (
{comm.clientCount} Clients
)}
{comm.actions.map((action, index) => ( ))}
))}
{/* Recent Communications Table */}

Recent Communications

Type Client Subject Date Status
Email GreenTech Initiative Grant Proposal Feedback Nov 15, 2024
Sent
Call Sarah Chen Budget Discussion Nov 14, 2024
Completed
Meeting Michael Rodriguez Q1 Planning Session Nov 18, 2024
Scheduled
{/* Right Column - Quick Actions Sidebar */}
{/* Quick Compose Card - Updated to remove duplicate button */}

Quick Compose

Start drafting immediately

Create new emails quickly with our streamlined composer

{/* Templates Card */}

Email Templates

Grant Follow-up

Professional follow-up template for grant applications

Used 45 times this month
{/* Recent Activity Card */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivities.slice(0, 3).map(activity => (

{activity.action} for {activity.client}

{activity.time}
))}
{/* Communication Summary */}

1,247

Total Communications

89%

Success Rate

12

Pending Actions

+18%

Monthly Growth

{/* Calendar Modal */} setShowCalendar(false)} events={calendarEvents} />
); }; export default CommunicationHub;
